entry.tran: (高尔夫运动中用来放置球的)球座
entry.def: In golf, a tee is a small piece of wood or plastic which is used to support the ball before it is hit at the start of each hole.

entry.tran: (高尔夫运动中的)开球区，发球区
entry.def: On a golf course, a tee is one of the small flat areas of ground from which people hit the ball at the start of each hole.

means.word_mean: 1. the starting place for each hole on a golf course;

sentences.sentence: "they were waiting on the first tee"

means.word_mean: 2. support holding a football on end and above the ground preparatory to the kickoff
3. a short peg put into the ground to hold a golf ball off the ground
